Austin Apple Admins

August Meetup Recap

20 Sep 2018
  • news

We had a great time at The Home Depot where we joined forces with the Atlanta Apple Admins meetup group for a multi-site meetup! Thanks again to Chris Miller of Eanes ISD for his demo of the Tightrope App for digital signage, and Emily Kausalik-Whittle for her discussion on building VMs for DEP and MDM enrollment testing. And special thanks to Jamf and Heather Adel for providing pizza to both locations!

Below are the assets from the meetup, including the main deck and a recording of the Facebook Live video.

Main deck

Emily Kausalik-Whitle - Build MDM and DEP VMs

Facebook Live Feed

Until next time…

Come find us at the JNUC for some stickers!

If you’d like to speak at a future meetup in Austin please let us know.
